text: numbala aturin biriyan hæra dama maranayata pat vuvan tama biriyanta vasarak dakva (nivasin) ovun pituvahal kirimakin torava ( ahara ændum yanadiya) bhukti vindimata hæki vana paridi antima kæmætta prakasa kala yutuya. namut ovun bæhæra va gos ovun sambandhayen ovun yahapat andamin yamak sidu kara gatte nam e pilibanda va numbala kerehi varadak næta. tavada allah sarva baladhariya abhignanavanta ya
